name: Tap Money Rain
description:
Experience the earner, the feeling of making money!
You can experience a real rich feeling in this game!


As long as you click fast enough, you can make a lot of money, come and experience it!


How to play?
You only need to tap the screen infinitely to get monetary rewards!
The faster you click, the more comfortable it is to make money!


Download "Tap Money Rain" to find out how much money you can make?
